Title: Relates to financial liability for major facilities, vessels, and railroads
Summary: Requires the owner or operator of a vessel to establish and maintain with the department evidence of financial responsibility sufficient to meet the amount of liability.
LawCode: Amd ยง181, add ยง181-f, Nav L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to financial responsibility for the liability of a major facility or vessel
